org.grobid.service.util
Class GrobidServiceProperties

java.lang.Object
  org.grobid.service.util.GrobidServiceProperties

public class GrobidServiceProperties
extends Object

This class handles all properties, which can be set for the grobid-service project. it is directly extended by the GrobidProperties class and therefore also contains all properties neccessary for the grobid-core project. A file defining properties for grobid-service must have the name ' ' and can be contained in path either located by the system property or the system property or given by context property (retrieved via InitialContext().lookup(...)). If both are set this class will try to load the file in first.

Author:
Florian Zipser

getNewInstance

protected static GrobidServiceProperties getNewInstance()
Creates a new GrobidServiceProperties object, initializes it and returns it. First checks to find the grobid home folder by resolving the given context. When no context properties exist, The detection will be given to GrobidProperties#detectGrobidHomePath().
